content: Thanks for this amazing post. I’ve always had this thought that I need to act, make decisions, and commit to it but this post shows the way. This post crystallize what I’ve had in my mind. I can now realize the conflict between two systems, BIS and BAS, and that I am prone to a lesser goal because it is clear to see. Most of all, I love the idea of making decisions at the peak state. I always thought that we are supposed to make big decisions under pressure because making such decisions were always stressful.
